text:
August
Thirteenth
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Novik
Radio Station WYNO
Municipal Broadoasting System
New York City
Dear Maury8
Thanks a lot for your suggestions. They led
the field in timeliness although I now have
a few others from our members and hope to
have the program in shape within the next
few days.
Cordially,
FE S/rep
Frank E. Schooley
